content:
I'm so glad to hear that! It's wonderful that you have prior experience with solo travel and know how liberating and empowering it can be. Paris is a fantastic destination, and I'm sure you'll have an amazing time exploring the city, trying new foods, and soaking up the culture.

Remember to be open-minded, flexible, and kind to yourself as you navigate the city. Don't hesitate to ask for help or directions, and don't be afraid to try new things. And, of course, take plenty of photos and enjoy every moment of your trip!

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, bon voyage and à bientôt à Paris!
